title: 9. Boundaries: Saying No as a Form of Self Care (Part 2)
description:
Hey girl hey!

 

This week we get into boundaries (aka saying no!) as a form of self care in the second part of this 3 part series. We tend to think of self care of being an external activity but tune in to this episode to discover why boundaries is also a MAJOR contributor to self care. 

 

Don't forget to rate review & subscribe!

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
